hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "A woman and her paternal aunt should not be married to the same man; and similarly, a woman and her maternal aunt should not be married to the same man

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ تُنْكَحُ الْمَرْأَةُ عَلَى عَمَّتِهَا
chapter.eng-name: A woman should not marry a man already married to her paternal aunt
